Package de.weltraumschaf.jvfs

A virtual in-memory file system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JvfsAssertions
    Static methods to assert values.
    JvfsCollections
    Helper class which infers generic types for collections.
    JvfsDirectoryStream  
    JvfsFileAttributes
    Represents the file attributes.
    JvfsFileAttributeView  
    JvfsFileChannel
    Represents a file channel.
    JvfsFileEntry
    Holds the administrative data of a file entry in the virtual file system.
    JvfsFileStore  
    JvfsFileSystem
    Maintains the file system specific hierarchy.
    JvfsFileSystemProvider
    Implements the I/O operations.
    JvfsFileSystems
    Factory to get virtual file system stuff.
    JvfsPath
    Represents a file's location in a file system.
    JvfsPathMatcher  
    JvfsSeekableByteChannel
    Implementation of a seekable byte channel.

Package de.weltraumschaf.jvfs Description

A virtual in-memory file system. Mostly inspired by the Shrinkwrap project and therefore some code is copied from there. Resources: - http://jaxenter.de/artikel/javaniofile-Zeitgemaesses-Arbeiten-mit-Dateien-166848 - http://exitcondition.alrubinger.com/2012/08/17/shrinkwrap-nio2/ - http://arquillian.org/guides/shrinkwrap_introduction/ - http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/guides/io/fsp/zipfilesystemprovider.html
